item.title: My Understanding of RInno
item.description: In today's post I want to go over RInno for deploying Shiny apps to desktop as well as the benefits and how to get it all going.

item.title: My Understanding of Blogdown & Github
item.description: As seems to be Blogdown tradition my first blog post using blogdown is a quick and dirty guide for getting a blogdown site off the ground.
